column5: Just finished my last ice fishing trip a few days ago for one of my fav's... Spec's!! Was N.W of Ottawa and we had to ATV in approx 25km's from the cottage we stayed at...enjoyed awesome weather, amazing shorelunch, wildlife including a Moose on the trail coming out.... oh ya.. and a few nice Specs too!  All fish were taken in 3 to 7' of water with worm tipped spoons and just a worm and split shot rig. Looking forward to getting back up in the next 2-3 weeks for a softwater trip      Be safe and Good Fish'n!... Greg.
Looked like an awsome day. Fishing and great weather. Nice fish  Slayer
Quebec has some wicked brookie fishing, that's for sure!!!  Great fish!
sweet specs! looks like you guys had some excellent spring weather too. it was like punta algoma the last 2 weekends on the ice.  let'er melt!
Nicely done!  All 3 of my April speck trips produced a big donut.
Greg, you make me sick!   Great report and yes, spectacular fish.
Wow... beauty fish!!! same as Joey, I busted in April.
Wow, some real beauts there.  Excellent
